name: Mushroom Mayhem
description:
Game submission for Lost Relic Games 2022.

Theme: Connection

Team:

Fabian (https://fabianf.itch.io/)

Helga (https://hhelheim.itch.io/)

Nigel (https://niguelchaos.itch.io/)

Rivindu (https://rivinwick.itch.io/)

Destroy all the evil imps by causing a massive chain reaction of explosive mushrooms! The mushroom explosions connect with each other. Have fun!
